items.subject: Professional Fees Accrual Reversal Failed - Action Required
items.body: The automated reversal for Professional Fees Accrual ACR-2025-08-ENT100-001 ($29,408.57) failed during overnight processing. System error code: REV_FAIL_001. Manual journal entry required to reverse August accrual before close. Please coordinate with Legal team on outstanding invoices from external counsel.
items.summary: Professional fees accrual reversal failure requiring manual intervention

items.subject: Duplicate Payment Alert - Salesforce Invoice
items.body: Alert: Duplicate payment detected for Salesforce invoice SF-2025-08-001. Original payment $12,500 processed on 08/15, duplicate payment $12,500 processed on 08/16. Payment reference: PAY-ENT100-0847 and PAY-ENT100-0851. Initiating recovery process with vendor. Please hold future Salesforce payments pending resolution.
items.summary: Duplicate Salesforce payment requiring vendor recovery

items.subject: Google Payment Timing Difference - August Close
items.body: Google payment $45,000 received August 31st at 23:58 UTC but recorded in September due to cutoff timing. Transaction ref: BANK-ENT100-0923. Requires cutoff adjustment for August close accuracy. Supporting documentation attached showing wire receipt timestamp vs. system posting date.
items.summary: Google payment cutoff timing difference requiring adjustment

items.subject: FX Revaluation Impact - EUR/USD Rate Change
items.body: EUR/USD exchange rate moved from 1.085 to 1.092 during August, resulting in €850K revaluation gain on EUR-denominated positions. Impact primarily on ENT101 cash and receivables balances. Revaluation journal entry JE-2025-08-FX-001 prepared for month-end close. Please review for materiality assessment.
items.summary: EUR/USD revaluation gain requiring materiality review

items.subject: Intercompany Reconciliation - ENT100/ENT101 Variance
items.body: Intercompany reconciliation between ENT100 and ENT101 shows $15K variance in software license transfers. ENT100 records $485K payable, ENT101 records $500K receivable. Investigating timing difference in August license allocation. May require elimination adjustment for consolidated reporting.
